testcase.name: Verify the logo image of initial screen on layout
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the logo on initial screen is in accordance with the prototype layout.
testcase.preconditions: Having the prototype for comparison.

step.expectedresults: The system will be successfully displayed

step.actions: At initial screen, verify if the logo "VALID" is shown in accordance with the layout of the prototype.
step.expectedresults: The logo "VALID" is consistent with the layout of the prototype

testcase.name: Login with user and password fields empty
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if is possible to access the system with User and Password fields empty.

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page

step.actions: Leave the User and Password fields empty
step.expectedresults: No field has been filled
Botton Enter is clicked

step.actions: Check if is possible to access the system
step.expectedresults: It is not possible to access the system and message "Login Fail: Please check your username and password" is shown

testcase.name: Login with valid user and password
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if is possible to access the system with the User and Password fields filled with valid information.

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page
The User field is filled
The Password field is filled
Botton Enter is clicked

step.actions: Check if is possible to access the system
step.expectedresults: The system is accessed successfully

testcase.name: Verify Enter button with valid information
testcase.summary: This test shall verify enter button functionality using valid informations of user.

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page

step.actions: Enter valid username and password in their respectives fields
step.expectedresults: The fields are filled
Button Enter is clicked

step.actions: Check if is possible to access the system
step.expectedresults: The system is accessed successfully

testcase.name: Login with only user field filled
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if is possible to access the system with User field filled and Password field empty

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page
The User field is filled
Botton Enter is clicked

step.actions: Check if is possible to access the system
step.expectedresults: It is not possible to access the system and message "Login Fail: Please check your username and password" is shown

testcase.name: Login with only password field filled
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if is possible access the system with User field empty and Password field filled.

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page
The Password field is filled
Botton Enter is clicked

step.actions: Check if is possible to access the system
step.expectedresults: It is not possible to access the system and message "Login Fail: Please check your username and password" is shown

testcase.name: Login with valid user (but with capital letter) and password
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if is possible to access the system with valid user (capital letter) and password

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page
The User field is filled
The Password field is filled
Botton Enter is clicked

step.actions: Check if is possible to access the system
step.expectedresults: It is not possible to access the system and message "Login Fail: Please check your username and password" is shown

testcase.name: Login with invalid user and valid password
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if is possible to access the system with the User field filled with invalid information and the Password field filled with valid information.

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page
The User field is filled
The Password field is filled
Botton Enter is clicked

step.actions: Check if is possible to access the system
step.expectedresults: It is not possible to access the system and message "Login Fail: Please check your username and password" is shown

testcase.name: Login with valid user and invalid password
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if is possible to access the system with the User field filled with valid information and the Password field filled with invalid information.

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page
The User field is filled
The Password field is filled
Botton Enter is clicked

step.actions: Check if is possible to access the system
step.expectedresults: It is not possible to access the system and message "Login Fail: Please check your username and password" is shown

testcase.name: Login with user and password invalid
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if is possible to access the system with the User and Password fields filled with invalid information.

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page
The User field is filled
The Password field is filled
Botton Enter is clicked

step.actions: Check if is possible to access the system
step.expectedresults: It is not possible to access the system and message "Login Fail: Please check your username and password" is shown

testcase.name: Verify if "User" field accepts space before typing username
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if is possible insert space before typing username.

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page
The User field is filled with spaces followed by a valid user
The Password field is filled
Button Enter is clicked

step.actions: Check if is possible to access the system
step.expectedresults: The system is accessed successfully

testcase.name: Check if is possible to login after switching users with different authority
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if is possible to access the system after switching users with different authority (i.e. Admin and Marketing).
testcase.preconditions: To have one user with admin authority and one user with marketing authority.

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page
The User field is filled
The Password field is filled
Botton Enter is clicked

step.actions: Check if is possible to access the system
step.expectedresults: The system is accessed successfully, with a user authority Admin

step.actions: On the pop-up shown, choose one of the companies presented on the list
step.expectedresults: One of the companies in the list is chosen
Button "OK" is clicked

step.actions: At the upper right corner of the page, click over the current user
step.expectedresults: A menu is opened
The logout is done successfully and the system returns to Login page
The User field is filled
The Password field is filled
Button Enter is clicked

step.actions: Check if is possible to access the system, now that the user has a different authority
step.expectedresults: It is possible to access the system sucessfully

testcase.name: Verify language selection (PT-BR)
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if is possible change initial screen language

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page

step.actions: Enter valid username and password in their respectives fields
step.expectedresults: The fields are filled
Portuguese is selected
Button Enter is clicked and initial system page is shown

step.actions: Check whether the initial screen texts are in accordance with the selected language
step.expectedresults: The system displays the information according to the selected language

testcase.name: Verify language selection (EN)
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if is possible to change initial screen language

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page

step.actions: Enter valid username and password in their respectives fields
step.expectedresults: The fields are filled
English is selected
Button Enter is clicked and initial system page is shown

step.actions: Check whether the initial screen texts are in accordance with the selected language
step.expectedresults: The system displays the information according to the selected language

testcase.name: Verify language selection (ES)
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if is possible change initial screen language

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page

step.actions: Enter valid username and password in their respectives fields
step.expectedresults: The fields are filled
Spanish is selected
Button Enter is clicked and initial system page is shown

step.actions: Check whether the initial screen texts are in accordance with the selected language
step.expectedresults: The system displays the information according to the selected language

testcase.name: Try to login with an user that is already logged in
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if system logs out an user logged in, when he logs again in the system without logout of his first session.
testcase.preconditions:
To have "default" user created. Username: default, Password: default, Permission: ADMIN

Needs two IP addresses

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page
The User field is filled
The Password field is filled
The system is successfully accessed
The system is successfully displayed at the Login page at a new tab on browser
The User field is filled
The Password field is filled
The button Enter is clicked

step.actions: Check if is possible to access the system
step.expectedresults: It is possible to access the system

step.actions: With the first user logged in navigate in the system for at least three clicks
step.expectedresults: First user logged in navigates in the system

step.actions: Check if the first user logged in is logged out after some clicks
step.expectedresults: The first user is successfully logged out and the login page is displayed

testcase.name: Verify if user is moved to the login page when session expires
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if system returns to the Login page when session of user expires

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page
The User field is filled
The Password field is filled
The system is successfully accessed

step.actions: Wait for 30 minutes, without click, navitate or perform any actions on the system
step.expectedresults: The system stands still for 30 minutes
The system screen changes

step.actions: Check if system automatically redirects to the Login page
step.expectedresults: System successfully automatically redirects to the Login page

testcase.name: Check if user is logged out when an admin user changes his authority
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if user is logged out when an admin user changes his authority
testcase.preconditions:
To have two users: First user with admin permission and Second user with marketing permission
Which one will be logged in on system by different tabs of browser at the same time

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page

step.actions: Acess system with an admin user
step.expectedresults: The system is acessed with admin user

step.actions: Open another tab on the browser and access Valid system
step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page at a new tab on browser

step.actions: Acess the system with a marketing permission user
step.expectedresults: The system is acessed with a marketing permission user

step.actions: On the first tab, with admin user, click at Settings
step.expectedresults: A menu is displayed
The screen changes and Users menu appears
The list of registered users is displayed

step.actions: Change the authority of second user logged in from Marketing to Admin
step.expectedresults: The second user's authority is changed to admin

step.actions: On the other tab where second user is logged in, try to navigate thought system
step.expectedresults: The user tries to navigate throught system

step.actions: Check if system redirects the second user to the Login page
step.expectedresults: The second user is  redirected to the Login page

testcase.name: Check if user is logged out when the browser he is logged in is closed
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if user is logged out when browser is closed. When user reopens the browser the system must show the Login page for this user.

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page
The user is logged in

step.actions: Close the browser where you are logged in
step.expectedresults: The browser is closed
The browser is opened
The system is successfully displayed

step.actions: Check if the Login page is displayed
step.expectedresults: The Login page is displayed

testcase.name: Check if user is logged out when the tab he is logged in is closed
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if user is logged out when browser is closed. When user reopens the browser the system must show the Login page for this user.
testcase.preconditions: To have a created user and more than one tab opened on browser

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page
The user is logged in

step.actions: Close the tab where you are logged in
step.expectedresults: The tab is closed and the browser is still opened

step.actions: In another tab, acess Valid system
step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed

step.actions: Check if the Login page is displayed
step.expectedresults: The Login page is successfuly displayed

testcase.name: Check if Lost Password window opens
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the link "Lost Password?" at the Login page opens the "Lost Password?" window when clicked

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page
The link is clicked

step.actions: Check if the window "Lost Password" is opened
step.expectedresults: The window "Lost Password?" is successfully opened

testcase.name: Check if Lost Password window closes
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the "Lost Password?" window closes correctly when the button "x" is clicked on its window

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page
The window "Lost Password?" is successfully opened

step.actions: Click at the button "x" at the top right corner of window "Lost Password?"
step.expectedresults: The button "x" is clicked

step.actions: Check if the window "Lost Password?" is closed
step.expectedresults: The window "Lost Password?" is successfully closed

testcase.name: Check if Terms and Condition window opens
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the Terms and Conditions window opens correctly when its link is clicked at the Login page

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page
The link is clicked

step.actions: Check if the window "Terms and Conditions" is opened
step.expectedresults: The window "Terms and Conditions" is successfully opened

testcase.name: Verify "OK" button functionality on "Terms and Conditions" window
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if OK button returns to Login page when clicked.

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page
The window "Terms and Conditions" is shown
The window "Terms and Conditions" is closed

step.actions: Check if the system returns to the Login page
step.expectedresults: The system returns to the Login page successfully

testcase.name: Check if Terms and Condition window closes
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the Terms and Conditions window closes correctly when the button "x" is clicked on its window

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page
The window "Terms and Conditions" is successfully opened

step.actions: Click at the button "x" at the top right corner of window "Terms and Conditions"
step.expectedresults: The button "x" is clicked

step.actions: Check if the window "Terms and Conditions" is closed
step.expectedresults: The window "Terms and Conditions" is successfully closed

testcase.name: Check if Terms and Conditions are displayed
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the Terms and Conditions content are displayed on Terms and Conditions window

step.expectedresults: The system is successfully displayed at the Login page
The window "Terms and Conditions" is successfully opened

step.actions: Check if the Terms and Conditions content are displayed in the window
step.expectedresults: The content are correctly displayed in the window

testcase.name: Reset password through Lost Password link
testcase.summary: This test case shall verify if a user can change his password in the system though Lost Password link

step.actions: User clicks at "Lost Password?" in Login screen
step.expectedresults: System opens the "Lost Password?" window

step.actions: User inserts the username and email correctly on the appropriate fields
step.expectedresults: System shows the Username and Email fields filled.
The request for password change is processed and an email is sent to the user, containing a link for the insertion of a new password
Link leads to a Page to insert new Password.

step.actions: User inserts a valid new Password and Save.
step.expectedresults: System shows a success message.
The new password is successfully received

step.actions: User logs in System with new password.
step.expectedresults: The system is successfully accessed with the new password

testcase.name: Reset Password with inexistent username
testcase.summary: This test case shall verify if system prevents an user to reset a password in the system with inexistent username

step.actions: User clicks at "Lost Password?" in Login Screen
step.expectedresults: The "Lost Password?" window is opened

step.actions: User inserts an inexistent username and an available email already registered on the system on theirs respectives fields
step.expectedresults: The fields username and email are properly filled
System shows a message informing that the username is inexistent, therefore the password will not be reseted

testcase.name: Reset Password with inexistent email
testcase.summary: This test case shall verify if a user can not change their password in the system with inexistent email.

step.actions: User clicks "Lost Password?" in Login Screen.
step.expectedresults: System shows the Recover Password Form.

step.actions: User inserts the inexistent email and correct username on the appropriate fields
step.expectedresults: System shows the Username and Email fields filled.
System shows a message informing email is inexistent.

testcase.name: Reset Password with unmatching username and email
testcase.summary: This test case shall verify if a user can not change their password in the system with unmatching username and email.

step.actions: User clicks "Lost Password?" in Login Screen.
step.expectedresults: System shows the Recover Password Form.

step.actions: User inserts the username and email that are not from same User.
step.expectedresults: System shows the Username and Email fields filled.
System shows a message informing username are unmatching

testcase.name: Reset Password without username
testcase.summary: This test case shall verify if a user can not change their password in the system without username.

step.actions: User clicks "Lost Password?" in Login Screen.
step.expectedresults: System shows the Recover Password Form.

step.actions: User inserts the without username and with correct email on the appropriate fields
step.expectedresults: System shows the Username field empty and Email field filled.
System shows a message informing username is empty.

testcase.name: Reset Password without email
testcase.summary: This test case shall verify if a user can not change their password in the system without email.

step.actions: User clicks "Lost Password?" in Login Screen.
step.expectedresults: System shows the Recover Password Form.

step.actions: User inserts the without email and with correct username on the appropriate fields
step.expectedresults: System shows the Username field filled and Email field empty.
System shows a message informing email is empty.

testcase.name: Cancel Reset Password
testcase.summary: This test case shall verify if a user can cancel change their password in the system

step.actions: User clicks "Lost Password?" in Login Screen.
step.expectedresults: System shows the Recover Password Form.

step.actions: User inserts the username and email correctly on the appropriate fields
step.expectedresults: System shows the Username and Email fields filled.
System does not send any email to reset Password.

testcase.name: Reset Password after Expiration Time
testcase.summary: This test case shall verify if a user can not change their password in the system after Reset Link Expiration Time.

step.actions: User clicks "Lost Password?" in Login Screen.
step.expectedresults: System shows the Recover Password Form.

step.actions: User inserts the username and email correctly on the appropriate fields
step.expectedresults: System shows the Username and Email fields filled.
The request for password change is processed and an email is sent to the user, containing a link for the insertion of a new password

step.actions: User clicks received Link after expiration Time.
step.expectedresults: Link leads to a Page informing Validity Time of Reset Link is ended.

testcase.name: Reset Password twice using same link
testcase.summary: This test case shall verify if a user can not change their password in the system twice using same link

step.actions: User clicks "Lost Password?" in Login Screen.
step.expectedresults: System shows the Recover Password Form.

step.actions: User inserts the username and email correctly on the appropriate fields
step.expectedresults: System shows the Username and Email fields filled.
The request for password change is processed and an email is sent to the user, containing a link for the insertion of a new password
Link leads to a Page to insert new Password.

step.actions: User inserts a valid new Password and Save.
step.expectedresults: System shows a success message.

step.actions: User logs in System with new password.
step.expectedresults: System shows the System logged.
Links leads to a Page informing this Link was already used.

testcase.name: Reset Password without username and email
testcase.summary: This test case shall verify if a user can not change their password in the system without username and email.

step.actions: User clicks "Lost Password?" in Login Screen.
step.expectedresults: System shows the Recover Password Form.

step.actions: User does not fill the fields username and email
step.expectedresults: System shows fields empty
System shows a message informing username and email are empty.
